name: Mobilecastle
body:
### App Privacy
We take privacy seriously. Please read our policy below and let us know if you have any questions or feedback.

### Personal Information
We do not collect any personal information about the users of our apps. We do not knowingly contact or collect personal information through app. If you believe we have inadvertently collected such information, please contact us so we can promptly remove the information.

### Links within Apps
There is two kinds of link in apps: 
Link one: Current app link from which user can support us by rating app and tell us about their feeling through comment.
Link two: This one is our app store link to see all of our apps.

### Advertising
Only Google admob ads are used with following rules of Ad-supported family app. 

### Privacy Questions
If you have any questions about our apps or privacy policy please contact us at: ashikdas.cse@gmail.com

### Changes
We reserve the right, at any time, to add to, change, update, or modify this Policy, simply by posting such change, update, or modification on the Site and without any other notice to you. Any such change, update, or modification will be effective immediately upon posting on the Site. It is your responsibility to review this Policy from time to time to ensure that you continue to agree with all of its terms.

The Privacy Policy was last updated on 15 October 2015.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
